import React, { useState } from 'react' import M from 'materialize-css/dist/js/materialize.min.js' const AddLogModal = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState('') const [attention, setAttention] = useState(false) const [tech, setTech] = useState('') const onSubmit = () => { if(message === '' || tech === '' ){ M.toast({ html: 'Please Enter a Message and a Tech'}) }else{ console.log(message, tech, attention) } } return (
